anathema: Act above your station, neglect your defenses, betray a lover
edict: Uphold absolute law, pursue perfection in your surroundings, speak with refinement
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Dispater (Iron Lord)](/Deities.aspx?ID=397)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 300

[Hell’s](/Planes.aspx?ID=42) second layer is the Diabolic City, Dis, and its ruler is the archdevil Dispater. The Iron Lord is the architect of the orderly perfection of Hell as a blueprint for the rest of [the multiverse](/Rules.aspx?ID=2988), responsible for Dis’s own vile and startling perfection. He remains distant from the scheming and machinations of the other archdevils and [the Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26), instead modeling calm and deliberate action combined with ruthless, merciless arrogance. As the most urbane of the archdevils, he attracts many followers among those who wish to see Hell’s dark majesty spread across the universe.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Archdevils](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=4)

**Edicts** Uphold absolute law, pursue perfection in your surroundings, speak with refinement

**Anathema** Act above your station, neglect your defenses, betray a lover

**Area of Concern**
Cities, prisons, rulership

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=362)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Tether](/Spells.aspx?ID=2370)

- **4th**
[Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1693)

- **6th**
[Petrify](/Spells.aspx?ID=1628)

</column>
name: Dispater (Iron Lord)
